record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="intronetview" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: NetView is an IBM product that has become an industry standard in supporting large data center networks.

detail.detail: The NetView interface has a real-time link between Service Manager and NetView, and has the ability to apply a set of user-defined filtering criteria to NetView generated messages to determine whether to open Incident records.
The NetView Interface consists of several components:
NetView exit: Filters and formats data to be passed to the NetView scheduler
LU 0 link: Provides the connection between Service Manager and NetView.
NetView Scheduler: Accepts NetView messages, applies the filter, and optionally opens Incident records.
